function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited ventilation in waiting areas","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Install air purifiers or increase ventilation in the waiting areas","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Members, visitors","Owner":"Gym management"},{"Description":"Shared amenities in the break lounge","Impact":"Increased risk of surface transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement regular cleaning schedules and provide hand sanitizers in the break lounge","Technologies":"Disinfectant sprayers, regular cleaning equipment, hand sanitizers","People":"Members, visitors","Owner":"Gym management"},{"Description":"Overcrowding due to reservation system limitations","Impact":"Increased risk of close contact and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement a monitoring system to ensure compliance with occupancy limits and enforce social distancing measures","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring software, CCTV cameras","People":"Members, staff","Owner":"Gym management"}]}
